Brief Hospital Course:
This is a ___ year old single, unemployed, homeless man with 
numerous psychiatric diagnoses including schizophrenia, alcohol 
use disorder with no history of DT's or withdrawal seizures, s/p 
numerous psychiatric hospitalizations with recent discharge from 
___ 2 days prior to presentation, s/p numerous (reported) near 
lethal suicide attempts, who presented to ___ with ongoing 
depression, suicidal ideation in the setting of alcohol use, 
ongoing homelessness, limited psychosocial supports and chronic 
mental illness.

He says that staying clean has been 
difficult for him, especially staying in a wet shelter where 
people have been drinking and using drugs.

He is gay is not currently involved with anyone and was living 
in an ___ in ___ but was evicted in ___ and moved to 
___ and reports he was living in a motel but can no 
longer afford it and is now homeless.
